Package id.xfunction

Class ObjectsStore<T extends Serializable>

  • Object
    • ObjectsStore<T>
  • public class ObjectsStore<T extends Serializable>
extends Object
    Persistent store for Serializable objects. All objects are stored in a file you specify. Useful in case you need some simple persistent and don't have time to deal with DB (JPA) etc.
